snap(20,0,-30)

sky(255,255,255)
fog(255,255,255)
ground(255,250,140)
polys(255,0,0)

fadefrom(5000)
density(3)

name(Blood Beach)
nlaps(2)


set(48,0,0,0)p
set(15,0,5600,180)p
set(15,0,11200,180)
chk(42,0,11200,0)
set(15,0,16800,0)p
set(15,0,22400,0)
set(34,0,22400,0)pr
